thread.section_title: Almac Imports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Almac Imports | almacltd.com
thread.title: Allison W
thread.title_full: Almac Imports reviewed by Allison W

author: Allison W
title: Allison W
text: A client shared a link to a basket they want to use for an event in May. Customer service was great in helping me research some of the items I would need. They provided information that I would not have considered. The baskets and supplies that I ordered look great. I will used Almac Imports in the future.
